body_html: In a Differentiable Neural Computer (DNC) model, top_k is used in memory write access, which is in the RNN while loop, and this degrades performance tremendously. I'm looking forward to the implementation of GPU top_k, too.
body_text: In a Differentiable Neural Computer (DNC) model, top_k is used in memory write access, which is in the RNN while loop, and this degrades performance tremendously. I'm looking forward to the implementation of GPU top_k, too.
body: In a [Differentiable Neural Computer (DNC)](https://github.com/deepmind/dnc) model, top_k is used in memory write access, which is in the RNN while loop, and this degrades performance tremendously. I'm looking forward to the implementation of GPU top_k, too.
